title: My Pixel 2 wont connect to my Android Auto.
content:
1. Pixel 2 was working fine with android auto even with third party USB C cable. Now it has suddenly stopped.

2. I bought Pixel C-Type cable and it still isnt working. 

3. Samsung phones are connecting without any problem even with the pixel cable.

4. USB debugging is on/ off (tried both ways). 

5. Changed USB mode to file storage/android auto and still isnt working
